ModMetaData.name: Just Candles (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: stellar_kitty
ModMetaData.description: Add candles to the game Original Mod by APurpleApple (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1359492124) I changed some things as well (candles are not destroyed when their fuel is empty and every meat is allowed)
